artefact: Apply for a tax disc refund (form V14)

artefact.overview: Fill in form V14 and send to DVLA to apply for a vehicle tax disc refund
artefact.more_information:
##Instructions

^To fill in the tax disc refund form online you'll need to type in your personal details exactly as they are shown on your Registration Certificate (V5C), so it's a good idea to have the certificate handy.^

Instructions on how to print the form and where to send it are included in the online instructions.

If you don’t want to do it online, you can [download and print out form V14 (PDF, 170KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_065248.pdf "download and print out form V14 (PDF, 170KB)"){:rel="external"} and complete it by hand.
artefact.introduction:
Fill in the vehicle tax disc (vehicle licence) refund form V14 online, print it off and send to DVLA to get your refund.

*[DVLA]: Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency
